extension_name.message: Read Aloud: A Text to Speech Voice Reader

extension_description.message: Read aloud the current web-page article with one click, using text to speech (TTS). Supports 40+ languages.

options_rate_warning.message: Note: some voices may not work at a high speed.

player_tab_explanation.message: Read Aloud uses this tab for audio playback. This tab will automatically close after 5 minutes of no activity.

player_hidethistab_dialog_body.message:
If you hide this tab, Read Aloud will play audio inside the current webpage. This means navigating away from the page will cause the speech to stop.

(This setting can be reverted from the extension Options page)

player_permission_dialog_body.message: Allow Read Aloud to play audio?

error_no_text.message: Didn't find any text to read, try selecting the text you want to read first

error_upload_pdf.message: Please use the form to upload your PDF file to read aloud

error_ajax_pdf.message: Please save this PDF file to your computer and open it inside this [PDF viewer](open-pdf-viewer) to read aloud

error_file_access.message: You need to grant Read Aloud access to file URLs in extension [settings](open-extension-settings)

error_add_permissions.message: You need to grant Read Aloud additional [permissions](request-permissions) for this website

error_login_required.message: Please [sign in](sign-in) to use the Premium Voices

error_wavenet_auth_required.message: You need to grant additional [permissions](auth-wavenet) to enable Google Wavenet voices

google_translate_request_permission.message: Read Aloud would like to use Google Translate for text-to-speech.

google_translate_keep_page_open.message: Read Aloud is using Google Translate for text-to-speech.  Please keep this tab open.
